Instructions.text: Metal loss is the opposite of the % Metal Recovery and represents the material lost to the tailings. It can be calculated simply by subtracting the % Metal Recovery from 100%.

In a flotation process that presents a 70% Cu recovery, what is the metal loss? 

 Metal Loss =
 100 - Metal Recovery %
